name: Spellix Romwod

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
text: Spellix has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: Spellix's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: fire bolt*, mage hand, shocking grasp*
1/day each: chromatic orb, crown of madness, shield

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
text: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit (with advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
text: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

spells: fire bolt, mage hand, shocking grasp, silent image, chromatic orb, crown of madness, shield
description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden p. 144
